item.title: Resume
item.description: Software Engineer Problems I solved open source kubernetes cluster management 2017 Mar - present The two problems here were Managing the dozens or possibly thousands of variants of the desired state of a cluster or set of clusters. Leading an open source project from nothing to 6500 github stars and over 100 contributors. To create a kubernetes cluster, one declares the state of all cluster objects in files, then applies those files to the cluster.
